aboutpage.about: My name is Luis Henrique Nunes Alves and I'm 21 years old, I study analysis and systems development at Centro Universitário das Faculdades Metropolitanas Unidas(FMU), I'm a fullstack developer, I'm looking for an opportunity to acquire more knowledge in the area and improve my skills.
